rules_text:
[i]Liberating Winds[/i] – When Ced enters, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them. if you do, put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
[i]Promote[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if you have more than seven cards in your hand, transform Ced.
